title: POSTAL MOVIE:English Subs
description:
ToRRENT iS NoW DEAD 
                     (Get over it)
Salutations all
if u like me r sick of looking for the english subs or the english movie of postal
here ya go english subtitles for postal mind u they r pretty dodgy subs though
but i got the movie and the jokes using them.If any one out there who speaks german and english who also has some spare time would like to help translate this a bit better by all means do so.Well this might make some people a bit more happy



                                    SHaRE ThE PAiN
